channel.title: Admin on nixscape
channel.description:
Ok i use nixscape source. But im not a admin.. I trying to fix this before.. I rename bobb to my name. (my account name.) then in character folder, did o put in: 2. 2 = admin right?
Ok then wen i start Mopar and click run server, is i not admin anymore..
What wrong plz tell me how to be a admin

item.title: Admin on nixscape
item.dc:creator: @pl0x_pk pl0x pk
item.description:
@pl0x_pk wrote:

go to client.java and crtl+f and type in the owners name until you get to something like this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name"))
				{
					playerRights = 3;
				}

and change the name to yours (0=normal player 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner/co-owner)

Read full topic

item.title: Admin on nixscape
item.dc:creator: @miti0 miti0
item.description:
@miti0 wrote:

you need to change player rights to 3 not 2

Read full topic

item.title: Admin on nixscape
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Open client.java (in the nixscape folder) and look for the following:

if (playername.equalsIgnorecase("<some name here>") { playerRights = 2; }

change to the account that you want to be admin.

Then recompile your source and you’re ready to go!

Read full topic
